snippet.title: Renown: Combat Showcase
snippet.description:
Come join our discord community for updates on the upcoming Crowdfund, testing periods and more https://discord.gg/Tr2DxFh 
After many months of blood, sweat and tears we are happy to finally showcase our combat system.  

Up until now our team has focused on created a fun and well fleshed out combat system, It was our design philosophy that having a great combat system in place before we start building survival mechanics around it was absolutely crucial. so we are extremely proud to now be able to share our progress with you all.  
A lot of what you have seen in this video is placeholder such as the blood and animations, we hope to have these replaced soon.
A larger more encompassing video is in the works that will better describe Renown as a whole stay tuned.

Website: https://www.rdbkstudios.com/
